Verses: 1 kallaththeerkkadharisigalum Janangalukkulle Irundhaarkgal, Appadiye Ungalukkullum Kallappodhagargal Iruppaargal; Avargal Kettukkedhuvaana Vedhappurattukalaith Thandhiramaai Nuzhaiyappanni, Thangalaik Kirayaththukkukkonda Aandavarai Marudhaliththu, Thangalukkuth Theeviramaana Azhivai Varuviththukkolluvaargal.
2 avargaludaiya Ketta Nadakkaigalai Anegar Pinpatruvaargal; Avargalnimiththam Saththiyamaarkkam Thooshikkappadum.

3 porulaasaiyudaiyavargalaai, Thandhiramaana Vaarththaigalaal Ungalaith Thangalukku Aadhaayamaaga Vasappaduththikkolluvaargal; Poorvakaalamudhal Avargalukku Vidhikkappatta Aakkinai Ayarndhiraadhu, Avargaludaiya Azhivu Urangaadhu.
4 paavam Seydha Thoodhargalai Dhevan Thappavidaamal, Andhakaarach Sangiligalinaale Katti Naragaththile Thalli Niyaayaththeerppukku Vaikkappattavargalaaga Oppukkoduththu;
5 poorva Ulagaththaiyum Thappavidaamal, Needhiyaip Pirasangiththavanaagiya Novaa Mudhalaana Ettupperaik Kaappaatri, Avabakthiyullavargal Niraindha Ulagaththinmel Jalappiralayaththai Varappanni;
6 sodhom Gomoraa Ennum Pattanangalaiyum Saambalaakkik Kavizhththuppottu, Aakkinaikkullaagath Theerththu, Pirkaalaththile Avabakthiyaai Nadappavargalukku Avaigalaith Thirushtaandhamaaga Vaiththu;
7 akkiramakkaararukkul Vaasamaayirukkaiyil Avargaludaiya Kaamavikaara Nadakkaiyaal Varuththappattu;
8 naaldhorum Avargaludaiya Akkiramakkiriyaigalaik Kandu Kettu Needhiyulla Thannudaiya Irudhayaththil Vaathikkappatta Needhimaanaagiya Loththai Avar Ratchiththirukka;
9 karththar Dhevabakthiyullavargalaich Sodhanaiyinindru Ratchikkavum, Akkiramakkaararai Aakkinaikkullaanavargalaaga Niyaayaththeerppu Naalukku Vaikkavum Arindhirukkiraar.

10 viseshamaaga Asuththa Ichchaiyode Maamsaththirketrapadi Nadandhu, Karththaththuvaththai Asattaipannugiravargalai Appadich Seyvaar. Ivargal Thunigarakkaarar, Akangaarigal, Magaththuvangalai Thooshikka Anjaadhavargal.
11 adhiga Belanaiyum Vallamaiyaiyumudaiya Dhevathoodhargal Mudhalaaik Karththarukkumunbaaga Avargalaith Dhooshanamaaik Kutrappaduththamaattaargale.

12 ivargalo Pidipattazhikkappaduvatharku Undaana Buththiyatra Mirugajeevangalaippolath Thangalukkuth Theriyaadhavaigalaith Thooshiththu, Thangal Kettile Kettazhindhu, Aneedhaththin Balanai Adaivaargal.
13  Ivargal Orunaal Vaazhvai Inbamendrenni, Karaigalum Ilachchaigalumaayirundhu; Ungalode Virundhungaiyil Thangal Vanjanaigalil Ullaasamaai Vaazhgiravargal;

14 vipasaara Mayakkaththaal Niraindhavaikalum, Paavaththaivittoyaadhavaikalumaayirukkira Kankalaiyutaiyavarkal; Urudhiyillaadha Aaththumaakkalaith Thanthiramaaip Pidiththu, Porulaasaigalil Pazhagina Irudhayaththaiyudaiya Saabaththin Pillaigal.
15 semmaiyaana Vazhiyaivittuth Thappinadanthu, Peyorin Kumaaranaagiya Pileyaamin Vazhiyaip Pinpatripponavargal; Avan Aneedhaththin Kooliyaivirumbi,
16 thannudaiya Akkiramaththinimiththam Kadinthukollappattaan; Pesaadha Mirugam Manusharpechchaip Pesith Theerkkadharisiyinudaiya Madhikettaith Thaduththadhu.
17 ivargal Thanneerillaadha Kinarugalum, Suzhalkaatrinaal Adiyundodugira Megangalumaayirukkiraargal; Endrendraikkumulla Kaarirule Ivargalukku Vaikkappattirukkiradhu.

18 vanjagamaai Nadakkiravargalidaththilirundhu Aridhaaith Thappinavargalidaththil Ivargal Agandhaiyaana Veenvaarththaigalaip Pesi, Maamsa Ichchaigalinaalum Kaamavigaarangalinaalum Avargalaith Thandhiramaaip Pidikkiraargal.
19 thaangale Kettukku Adimaigalaayirundhum, Avargalukkuch Suyaadheenaththai Vaakkuththaththampannugiraargal; Edhinaal Oruvan Jeyikkappattirukkiraano Adharku Avan Adimaippattirukkiraane.

20 karththarum Ratchagarumaayirukkira Yesukiristhuvai Arigira Arivinaale Ulagaththin Asuththangalukkuth Thappinavargal Marupadiyum Avaigalaal Sikkikkondu Jeyikkappattaal, Avargaludaiya Pinnilaimai Munnilaimaiyilum Kedulladhaayirukkum.
21 avargal Needhiyin Maarkkaththai Arindha Pinpu Thangalukku Oppuvikkappatta Parisuththa Karpanaiyai Vittu Vilakuvadhaippaarkkilum Adhai Ariyaadhirundhaargalaanaal Avargalukku Nalamaayirukkum.
22 naai Thaan Kakkinadhaith Thinnavum, Kazhuvappatta Pandri Setrile Puralavum Thirumbinadhu Endru Sollappatta Meyyaana Pazhamozhiyinpadiye Avargalukkuch Sambaviththadhu.
